You step in the hall, taking a glance around the building to get oriented.Locke is nowhere to be seen.You recall his last words to you...[Locke]₿Look inmate, you'll be lined on up at the rock docks in three ticks for the charge ceremony or there'll be fire.What was he even saying? Rock docks? Ticks? Charge Ceremony?You look around for any signs that may point to the rock docks. You see one with an arrow labeled "Docks"[To Yourself]₿That must be it.Before you leave, you notice someone approaching you in the corner of your eye.₽Greet them₼angela-intro.txt₽Ignore them and go to the docks₼docks-early.txt..
